title: Interested in a townhome loft? We've got one, call us for more info~!
posting_body: Welcome to Glen Park, where apartments are spacious, and grounds are just a beautiful as a picture.
We offer 1-3 bedroom floor plans with something that will work for everyone.
All homes have a full size washer and dryer as well as wood burning fireplaces.
We strive to find the right price and floorplan that will work for you.
We have a mixture of townhomes and flats.

Along with our lovely apartments, you can enjoy some of our generous amenities: When you move in, you can relax and lounge by our sparkling outdoor pool, and year-round you can relax in the heated spa or sauna.
Come in and get your work out 24 hours 7 days a week in our deluxe fitness center.
You can bring your furry friend to the on-site dog park or get in a game of tennis on the court.
You can find all of our pricing and availability on our website.
Call us to schedule a tour our office hours are:
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floor plans and trim.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
